I have a basic implementation (possibly stupid)
question.

Hopefully the ASCII renditions of simple net's come
through cleanly.  The following questions pertain to
the ASCII drawings that follow.

G2 and G3 are created as mutations off of G1.  
Do the 4->3 connections get the same innovation
number?
If not, should node additions be incremented globally,
or at least be tracked by what connection they split 
as opposed to what new connections they create? 

G1

0        1        2
 \       |       /
  \      |      /
   \     |     /
    \    |    /
     \   |   /
      \  |  /
       \ | /
        \|/
	 3

G2

0        1        2
 \       |       /
  \      |      /
   \     |     /
    4    |    /
     \   |   /
      \  |  /
       \ | /
        \|/
	 3

G3

0        1        2
 \       |       /
  \      |      /
   \     |     /
    \    |    4
     \   |   /
      \  |  /
       \ | /
        \|/
	 3
